id.title: Enterprise (Anonim) — Omnichannel Lead Gen untuk B2B SaaS
id.summary: Integrasi demand gen lintas channel dengan scoring & routing real-time ke CRM.
id.body: Program B2B enterprise yang menggabungkan Google Search tematik, LinkedIn ABM, dan Meta retargeting. Lead scoring dihitung dari perilaku multi-touch, disalurkan ke CRM dengan SLA 5 menit. Playbook kreatif dirotasi tiap 10 hari untuk mencegah fatigue dan menjaga kualitas MQL→SQL.

en.title: Enterprise (Anonymized) — Omnichannel Lead Gen for B2B SaaS
en.summary: Cross-channel demand gen with real-time scoring and CRM routing.
en.body: Enterprise B2B program combining themed Google Search, LinkedIn ABM, and Meta retargeting. Leads are scored from multi-touch behavior and routed to CRM with a 5-minute SLA. Creative playbooks rotate every 10 days to prevent fatigue and preserve MQL→SQL quality.
